post: Thank you for your comments! I resolve to amend this omission! Here are Resurrection NOW, Inc. We accept that Christ’ Resurrection from the Dead is a Singular and Unrepeatable Event that happened in history, and exceeds history. For this reason, our post modern world can become, more and more clear – that this Singularity actually happened, and more and more clear, concerning how to enter Our Lord’s Event Horizon – so that we become Singular People – the True Meaning of Ecclesia – the People Called Out – just as St. Augustine says, VOCANS TEMPORALES – FACIENS AETERNOS!.
